text: Antonio Battista (born 10 February 1957 in Campobasso) is an Italian politician. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Battista served as Mayor of Campobasso from May 2014 to June 2019. He was also elected President of the Province of Campobasso on 1 September 2016. ==See also== *2014 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Campobasso ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Campobasso Category:Democratic Party (Italy) politicians Category:Presidents of the Province of Campobasso
title: Antonio Battista
